Afforestation helps in soil conservation.
Forest area in India should be 33% per policy.

Chipko Movement was for forest protection.

Bhakra Nangal dam is on Sutlej river.
Iron ore producing states include Odisha and Jharkhand.
Digboi in Assam is the oldest oil field.
Mumbai High is an offshore oil field.
Coal is a non-renewable resource.
Solar energy is a renewable resource.
Green Revolution increased wheat production.

Steel plant at Jamshedpur (TISCO) is private.
Conservation of resources is vital for sustainable development.
India's standard time is 5:30 hours ahead of GMT.
Karakoram Range is in northernmost India.
Gulf of Mannar separates India from Sri Lanka.
Narmada and Tapti rivers flow westwards.

Chota Nagpur plateau is known for minerals.
Sundarbans delta is named after Sundari trees.
Kashmir valley lies between Jhelum and Chenab?

Coromandel Coast is on Eastern side.
